flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A tool used for
watering BERRIES
and plants.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A tool used for
watering BERRIES
and plants.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A nifty watering pail.
Use it to promote strong growth in
BERRIES planted in soft soil.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
This is a tool for watering Berries you planted to
make them grow more quickly.

make them grow more quickly.
